title: [Old Ta'Faendryl, Market Road]
description: To the northeast, the dark silhouette of a great and spacious building rises into sight.  With the foundation supporting it blocked from view, the shadowed edifice appears to float in brooding silence above the ruined city.  A few stone steps lead up to a high platform that spreads out to the north.

To the northeast, a great and spacious building rises into sight.  With the foundation supporting it blocked from view, the sparkling white edifice appears to float in brooding silence above the ruined city.  A few stone steps lead up to a high platform that spreads out to the north.
